<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// In general, if the root node is already created and linked, it is not safe</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to add new nodes since they may be unreachable by the root. However,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
